      Constructors

      Chessboard()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addressBlock(java.lang.String s)
      addressBlock(String s) parses user input string into integers to refer to block addresses [row][column]
      boolean gameMove(java.lang.String FileRank)
      gameMove(String FileRank) Takes user input filerank to move a piece from old position to new position and performs the move Returns true if its able to perform the move else returns false
      boolean gameOver()
      gameOver() Checks if game is over and returns true if it is
      char gameStatus()
      gameStatus() Checks the current status of the game, in check, checkmate, winner, draw or resign and returns appropriate character for the same
      void printBoard()
      printBoard() will print any updates to the chess board
      void resetBoard()
      resetBoard() : initializes the chess board with all chess pieces in there initial positions, initializes all the blocks on the board as black and white

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
